    • Method Detail

      • applyTags

        public void applyTags()
        If any tags have been applied to this ItemBuilder, then one must run this so the tags are fully applied to the item.

      • setAura

        public void setAura(Aura aura,
                    int auraClass)
        Parameters:
        aura - Set the aura tag for this builder to the given aura.
        auraClass - Determins if the aura is Minor (-1), Normal (0), or Major (1).

      • setType

        public void setType(Type type)
        Parameters:

      • setDesc

        public void setDesc(java.lang.String[] desc,
                    java.lang.String highlight,
                    org.bukkit.ChatColor bulletpoint)
        Update the description of an item to the given list of words, using the highlight and bulletpoint strings to prefix their appropriate parts.
        Parameters:
        desc - A list of words with '\n' as their own individual word for line breaks.
        highlight - The prefix to apply to '%' marked words (start or end).
        bulletpoint - The prefix to apply to bulletpoint text ([*1], [*], [*4], [**]).

      • addApproval

        public void addApproval(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        Approval approval)
        Adds the approval for an item by the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to use for the approval.
        approval - The approval type to use.

      • removeApproval

        public void removeApproval()
        Removes the approval tag from an item.

      • isPlaceable

        public boolean isPlaceable()
        Returns:
        Whether this item can currently be placed or not.

      • togglePlaceable

        public boolean togglePlaceable()
        Returns:
        Whether this item can be placed AFTER it has been toggled.

      • setPlaceable

        public void setPlaceable(boolean placeable)
        Parameters:
        placeable - Manually set whether an item can be placed using a boolean.
